aboutMe_main: Hi, I'm a german speaking Frontend Developer based near Münsterland. Motivated by the limitless opportunities within IT, I am excited about crafting visually captivating and intuitive websites and applications.
aboutMe_flexible: Flexible in terms of working environments, I can work effectively both on-site in the ruhr area and remotely.
aboutMe_challenges: I am open-minded and always looking for personal challenges to constantly improve my knowledge and skills.
aboutMe_profession: In my profession, programming isn't just about writing code; it's a creative form of problem-solving. I take pride in my ability to distill complex technical challenges into simple, user-friendly solutions. This way, I help you achieve your goals and bring your visions to life.
skills_main: I have gained experience in building projects with different frontend technologies and concepts.
skills_contact: Feel free to contact me. I look forward to expanding on my previous knowledge.

JOIN.NAME: Join
JOIN.DESCRIPTION: Task manager inspired by the Kanban System. Create and organize tasks using drag and drop functions, assign users and categories.

EL_POLLO_LOCO.NAME: El Pollo Loco
EL_POLLO_LOCO.DESCRIPTION: A simple Jump-and-Run game based on an object-oriented approach. Help Pepe to find coins and salsa bottles to fight against the chicken endboss.

POKEDEX.NAME: Pokedex
POKEDEX.DESCRIPTION: Based on the PokéAPI a simple library that provides and catalogues pokemon information.

full: Read our privacy policy for more information
